turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order three pizzas from the new pizza pizzeria Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Â I'd like those to be small, on gluten-free crust. I would like one to have ham, bacon, and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and for the others?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would have one to be a New York style pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and the last one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For For the last pizza I'll take sausage, bacon and pepperoni, and olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would That would be all. Yeah, that's fantastic. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order was 3 small pizzas with gluten free crust, 1 with ham, bacon and pineapple, 1 new york style pizza, 1 with sausage, bacon, pepperoni, and olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56.49 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you that's really great. No, that's all. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome, i hope the pizzas are good.

items.name: the new pizza pizzeria Bella Luna
